title: What Dark-Skinned People Will Never Tell You
description: View these stories on marginalized folks and how bias in our world impacts them.

validation_fields.name: answer1
validation_fields.label: True or False: Eurocentric standards of beauty impact people all over the world.

validation_fields.name: answer2
validation_fields.label: True or False: One way we can combat colorism is to have more positive representations of dark skinned folks in the media.
